name: The Great Eggscape (Rtv666)
description:
My entry to Fear Jam 5 

Paschakounephobia = The fear of the Easter bunny.

The tale should be clear as you experience this game and the challenge level should be enough to keep you coming back awhile.

Arrow keys and space are the core controls.

Touch screen has been temperamental although you are welcome to try not sure you can win that way.

Happy Gaming!
